titleStmt.title: Die Martis, xxii. Novemb. 1642. An order of the Commons House of Parliament concerning the restitution of such goods to the owners as have been violently taken from them, having been plundered or pillaged by the souldiers.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Hen. Elsing Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
